summary: Tested the Job Role dropdown functionality in Step 2 of the Work Order creation form on the Master Data page. The reported bug has been FIXED. All features are working correctly: dropdown opens, shows available job roles, selection adds job role to list, target allocation works, progress bar updates, and navigation to Step 3 works when targets are fully allocated.
passed_tests: Master Data page loads for HO user
New Work Order button is clickable and opens dialog
Step 1 form fields work (WO number, total target, num job roles)
Next button takes user to Step 2
Job Role dropdown shows available job roles (2 available: CSC/Q0801, ELE/Q4601)
Selecting a job role adds it to the list with default target
Target allocation input works and updates progress bar
Second job role can be selected from dropdown
Dropdown shows 'Maximum job roles selected' when limit reached
Target fully allocated message shows when 150/150 allocated
Next: SDC Districts button enables when targets are fully allocated
Step 3 loads correctly with Work Order Summary
Contract value calculated correctly (â‚¹24,70,000 for 150 students)
seed_data_creation: Test user created with HO role for testing
context_for_next_testing_agent: The Job Role dropdown bug in Step 2 of the Work Order form has been fixed. The MasterWorkOrderForm component uses a key prop (selectKey) to force Select remount after selection, and availableJobRoles filtered list to show only unselected job roles. All 3 steps of the Work Order creation form are working correctly.

bug_verification.reported_issue: User cannot select job roles in the Work Order form Step 2
verification_details: Shows 2 available job roles: CSC/Q0801 and ELE/Q4601
Selecting a job role adds it to the list
Second job role can be selected
Dropdown updates to show remaining available roles
Next button enables when targets are fully allocated
Step 3 loads with correct summary data
